title: DDoS Attack Mitigation
description: A security alert indicates a potential DDoS attack against a specific IP range. The agent must mitigate it.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the DDoS alert and analyze the traffic patterns to confirm the attack.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms anomalous traffic from a wide range of source IPs targeting a single destination.

tasks.description: Activate the 'blackhole' routing protocol for the target IP to absorb the attack traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the blackhole route.

tasks.description: Monitor the network to ensure the attack is mitigated and legitimate services are unaffected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that overall network performance returns to normal.
